law.text: The corporation is authorized to accept and expend such moneys as may be appropriated from time to time by the General Assembly or such moneys as may be received from any source, including income from the corporation's operations, for effectuating its corporate purposes including, without limitation, the payment of the initial expenses of administration and operation.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 374, sec. 14, effective April 11, 1984.
